alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 8:34PM CDT until May 15 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Marsh River at Shelly affecting Norman County. Snake River AT Alvarado affecting Marshall County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum affecting Norman County. Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. Snake River below Warren affecting Marshall County. Two Rivers River near Hallock affecting Kittson County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING TO LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Snake River AT Alvarado. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening to late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 108.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD STAGE. Overland flooding of local agricultural land. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 103.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow to a crest of 107.5 feet Wednesday. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday. - Flood stage is 106.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
